channel.title: Neut King on game start
channel.description: #### What happened? I joined my first match on patch 1.1.0 and I got neut king ![20180322141244_1|690x388](upload://pL9lEM8HyE0klsk86GqXr3vDFIc.jpg) #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I thought Neut King on match start was removed #### Steps to reproduce: I chose Classic Mode but I think i was placed into a Casual match after waiting 2+ minutes #### Comments: Even the Mystic that talked with me was confused

item.description:
Confirmed in my game too

item.title: Neut King on game start
item.dc:creator: motolav
item.description:
What happened?

I joined my first match on patch 1.1.0 and I got neut king

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I thought Neut King on match start was removed

Steps to reproduce:

I chose Classic Mode but I think i was placed into a Casual match after waiting 2+ minutes

Comments:

Even the Mystic that talked with me was confused

Read full topic
